about_the_game:
Defend against sea creatures and pirates in Waves Ahoy!, a highly strategic roguelike deckbuilder. Collect cards, equip your crew, find treasures and craft your strategy on your journey to defeat evil Fata Morgana.

Embark with Marina, George or Thomas on their voyage to the horizon, to find Fata Morgana and keep their dreams alive.

Features:

  • Fully Visible Board: Board system provides complete information about incoming enemies, so plan ahead to stay afloat!

  • Choose between 3 characters with their own set of cards and playstyles.

  • Discover over 150 cards with 50+ items to enhance them. Find powerful synergies and unlock new cards every run!

  • Fight ever-changing hordes of enemies and over 12 unique bosses.

  • Interconnected Dialogue System: Events and choices from previous runs will impact dialogues as you find out more about this colorful world.
